
#### Data

This data includes over 3,100 ratings on different types of ramen around the world. The dataset contains 6 variables, including 2 numeric variables:

- review_number: Ramen review number

- stars: Rating of the ramen, 5 is best, 0 is worst

and 4 categorical variables:

- brand: Brand of the ramen

- variety: The ramen variety, e.g., a flavor, style, ingredient

- style: Style of container (cup, pack, tray)

- country: Origin country of the ramen brand

The data is collected from the [Ramen Rater](https://www.theramenrater.com/resources-2/the-list/). 


#### Purpose

The purpose of the app is to:

1. show an overview of how ramen is distributed across selected countries,
2. show what are the highest rated ramen brands and how different ramen styles can affect raters' preference towards particular brands, and 
3. allow users to freely explore in details and understand about a variety of ramen brands, including the review, country of origin, etc. 

The first part indicates majority of ramen distribution are located in Asian countries, namely South Korea, Japan, Indonesia and China. The second part provided a feature to let users learn more about the origin of various ramen varieties around the wold. The app also utilized interactive components to show the changes in ramen ratings in response to different styles (e.g. world map and interactive graphs).
